parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling or shutting off while driving can cause loss of control, accidents, or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Engine shuts off while driving
vehicle stalls when driving
sudden loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system can cause engine overheating, damage to engine components, and potentially lead to engine failure.
symptoms: Coolant leak
radiator hose failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the harmonic balancer can cause engine vibration, surging, and potentially lead to engine damage.
symptoms: Engine vibration
vehicle surging.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing gear can cause engine damage, stalling, or shutting off, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: Timing gear failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unreliable repair services can lead to repeated failures, financial losses, and potentially compromise vehicle safety.
symptoms: Repeated repairs
failure to diagnose or repair issues
misleading or dishonest repair services.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the master cylinder can cause the brakes to fail, leading to a loss of vehicle control, increased stopping distance, and a high risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the brakes do not respond when the pedal is pressed
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
the emergency brake must be used to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loosening of the tilt steering column bolts can cause the steering column to shift or detach, leading to a loss of steering control, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering column feels loose or wobbly
the steering wheel shifts or moves unexpectedly
the steering column makes a rattling or clunking noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system, particularly when cold, can cause the steering to become difficult or impossible, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering is difficult or hard to turn
especially when the engine is cold
the power steering pump makes a loud whining or grinding noise
the steering fluid is leaking or low.
